post.author: kat
post.body: What are you actually trying to do with this? If you want the texture to be 'smaller' ingame why not scale as such ingame on a brush? What you'll end up with in this case is the texture being force repeated on the brush that you set it on.

post.body: That's probably becasue you should be using an alphachannel to mask out the 'dead space' of the texture (if that is in fact what you're trying to do here).
